name: TicTacToe (Mawheto)
description:
TicTacToe is the most famous casual game in the world so we have designed a digital version of this classic.

You can play either :

* Against the computer

* Against a friend

* Against a remote friend

Enjoy with out moderation !

Follow us one Facebook @mawheto

The source code of our first game is gifted. Here they are https://github.com/edd34/TicTacToe_Godot
